extensionDescription.message: Saves {image, video, audio, links, selection, page} in directories relative to the default download directory.

translationCredits.description: Credits for translations. Leave ​ for blank. Eg. sv translation by @username <email or url>, Real Name <contact>

genericUnknownError.description: A generic error message used as a fallback

contextMenuItemOptions.description: Title of context menu item that opens the options menu when clicked.

contextMenuExclusive.description: Name for menu item when in exclusive mode.

contextMenuRoot.description: Name for root context menu item.

contextMenuLastUsed.description: Placeholder title for last used option.

contextMenuContextMedia.description: Indicator that Save In is saving just media.

contextMenuContextMediaOrLink.description: Indicator that Save In is saving a media or link.

contextMenuContextSelection.description: Indicator that Save In is saving a selection.

contextMenuContextPage.description: Indicator that Save In is saving a page.

contextMenuShowDefaultFolder.description: Title of context menu item that opens the default downloads directory in the system file manager when clicked.

notificationSuccessTitle.description: Notification title for a successful download

notificationFailureTitle.description: Notification title for a failed download

notificationRuleMatchedTitle.description: Notification title for a rule match

notificationRuleMatchFailedExclusiveTitl.message: Save In: Failed to route or rename download
notificationRuleMatchFailedExclusiveTitl.description: Notification title for no rule matches when in exclusive mode

notificationRuleMatchFailedExclusiveMess.description: Notification title for no rule matches when in exclusive mode

ruleMissingMatcher.message: Rule needs at least one matcher clause
ruleMissingMatcher.description: Error message for missing matcher in rule

ruleCaptureMissingMatcher.message: Capture clause is not targeting a matcher
ruleCaptureMissingMatcher.description: Error message for capture targeting missing matcher

ruleMissingCapture.message: Rule needs a capture clause to use capture variables
ruleMissingCapture.description: Error message for missing capture clause in rule

ruleMultipleCapture.message: Rule can only have one capture clause
ruleMultipleCapture.description: Error message for multiple capture clauses in rule

ruleMissingInto.message: Rule needs at least one into clause
ruleMissingInto.description: Error message for missing into clause in rule

ruleExtraInto.message: Rule can only have one into clause
ruleExtraInto.description: Error message for multiple into clauses in rule

ruleUnknownMatcher.description: Error message for an unknown matcher

ruleInvalidRegex.description: Error message for a rule with invalid regex

ruleBadClause.description: Error message for lines in rule with syntax errors

rulePathInvalidCharacter.description: Error message for rules with invalid characters in path

rulePathStartsWithDot.description: Error message for paths in routing rules that start with invalid characters

tabstripMenuSelectedTab.description: Tabstrip context menu label for saving selected tab

tabstripMenuMultipleSelectedTab.description: Tabstrip context menu label for saving one or more highlighted tab

tabstripMenuSaveChildrenTabs.message: Save other tabs opened from this tab
tabstripMenuSaveChildrenTabs.description: Tabstrip context menu label for saving child tabs

tabstripMenuSaveRightTabs.message: Save all tabs to right including this
tabstripMenuSaveRightTabs.description: Tabstrip context menu label for saving tabs to the right (inclusive)

tabstripMenuSaveRightTabsMatched.message: Save all tabs to right including this (must match a route)
tabstripMenuSaveRightTabsMatched.description: Tabstrip context menu label for saving tabs to the right (inclusive) that match a route

o_sDownloads.description: o prefixes are for options page text, s prefix are for section/subsection titles

o_lGuideSymlink.message: Guide: Save outside the default downloads directory

o_lDirectoryInstructionOnePerLine.message: One path per line, relative to the default download directory.

o_lDirectoryInstructionDot.message: downloads to the default download directory.

o_lDirectoryInstructionComment.message: at the end of a line adds a comment.

o_lDirectoryInstructionSymlink.message: A symlink is needed to save outside the default download directory.

o_lRoutingInstruction.message: Automate routing of downloads or renaming of files. Separate multiple rules with an empty line. See the guide for more details.

o_lRoutingLastDownloadHelp.message: Test your current rules, applied to the last downloaded file

o_lAccessKeysInstruction.message: Set accesskeys for Save In menu items. Chrome or Firefox >= 63.

o_cLastUsedMenu.description: c prefixes are for controls (buttons, etc)

o_cSaveLinks.message: Enable saving of links. Prefers sources if available

o_cSaveText.message: Enable saving of selected text with a ".selection.txt" extension

o_cSavePage.message: Enable saving of the current page

o_cSaveTabstripHelp.message: Saves a tab, tab group, or tabs to right

o_cOpenDialog.message: Open a save file dialog when saving

o_cOpenDialogNoExt.message: Open a save file dialog if filename has no extension

o_cOpenDialogShift.message: Open a save file dialog when menu item is clicked and SHIFT is held down

o_cOpenDialogOnFailure.message: Open a save file dialog if download fails

o_cDupeFilename.message: when a duplicate filename is encountered

o_cOpenDialogIfNoRulesMatch.message: Open a save file dialog if no rules match

o_cExclusiveMode.message: Exclusively use routing and renaming rules

o_cExclusiveModeHelp.message: Disables submenu for two-click downloads, saves relative to default downloads directory

o_cNotifyMatch.message: Show notification on a rule match

o_cNotifyCloseAfterHelp.message: 1s = 1000ms. Will not extend beyond OS/browser notification duration.

o_cSaveShortcutsTabsInstead.message: Save tabs as shortcuts instead (from right-click tab)

o_cKeyboardShortcutNumbers.message: Add number key shortcuts to context submenu items

o_cKeyboardShortcutClickToHelp.message: Hold down Alt (default) and click images or media to save them in the last used directory or default download directory. Injects a script into pages to listen for click events. Not all variables are available when using this. Requires page refresh to take effect.

o_cKeyboardShortcutModifierHelp.message: Modifier keycode for click-to-save. Requires page refresh to take effect.

o_cTruncatePath.message: Truncate path components to this many characters

o_cReplaceInvalidCharsWithHelp.message: Leave blank to delete. Invalid replacement characters are ignored.

o_cFetchViaContentScriptHelp.message: Do not enable this if you have no problems downloading. Download from the content page and not the extension, sending headers from the page itself. Some sites (eg. pixiv.net) require this to bypass server-side protections. Slower and prone to failure. Success/failure notifications do not work in this mode. Requires page refresh to take effect.

o_cFetchViaFetchAPIHelp.message: Do not enable this if you have no problems downloading. Download using HTML Fetch API instead of the browser’s Downloads API for extensions. Some sites (eg. Instagram) are incompatiable with Firefox’s Downloads API.

o_cSetRefererHeader.message: Set the "Referer" header to page URL if it is missing

o_cSetRefererHeaderHelp.message: Do not enable this if you have no problems downloading, and try using the content script option before this. Some sites (eg. pixiv.net) check HTTP Referer headers on the server. Enabling this will set the HTTP Referer header to the page URL if it does not already exist.

o_cSetRefererHeaderFilter.message: Set Referer headers for the following sites

o_cSetRefererHeaderFilterHelp.message: Whitelist of match patterns to match against. One per line. Headers will only be modified for downloads (source URLs) that match this whitelist.

o_lSubdirectoryInstructionComment.message: at the start creates nested submenus depending on the number of arrows.

notificationLinkPreferred.description: Notification title when link was downloaded over a source

o_cPreferLinksFilterEnabled.message: Prefer links for pages that match the following URLs

o_cPreferLinksFilterHelp.message: One regular expression to match against the page URL per line.

o_cNotifyLinkPreferred.message: Show notification when a link was downloaded instead of the source
